overview: Matthew Hobbs has been a leader in technology and management consulting to the professional services industry for more than sixteen years. As President of iEnvision, Matt is responsible for the overall management and business strategy of the firm. Management consulting and business process development, specifically in the area of project deployment and management, are two areas of expertise Matt delivers to our client base. Matt serves as the chief strategist for our ILM solutions and works closely with our clients to ensure our technology solutions map to their specific business needs. Matt holds a Bachelor of Science in Computer Science from the University of Maryland and an MBA with a specialization in International Finance from St. Maryâ€™s College of California.
